name: PrimeEvil
description: You play as a new employee at an Amazon warehouse trying to sort endless packages and getting paid by commission. The management even expect you to relieve yourself into a bottle and blame you if you miss a drop. Meanwhile your co-worker is in a bad way, and must either help him or do his job. Once that's over it's time to return home and purchase items to make your job just that little easier. Try to last at least a week until they furlough you, and you can have some well deserved rest.
